-----------Enter bugs above this line-----------
RSE 1.0 Testing round 2
installation : eclipse-SDK-3.2.1 (M20060921-0945), cdt-3.1.1
RSE install  : RSE-SDK-1.0RC1.zip
java.runtime : 1.5.0_06-b05
os.name:     : Linux 2.4.20-8
------------------------------------------------
systemtype   : Linux (dstore-processes)
targetos     : Linux 2.4.20-8
targetvm     : 1.5.0_06-b05
------------------------------------------------

To reproduce the problem:
1) create a linux connection using dstore
2) establish the connection
3) select All Processes, right click to open the context menu, select "Monitor"
4) the remote monitor view is displayed. Click on the "Refresh" Action in view's toolbar, you will get a ClassCastException in PDE error log.

java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.SystemTableTreeViewProvider
	at org.eclipse.rse.ui.view.monitor.SystemMonitorViewPart$RefreshAction.run(SystemMonitorViewPart.java:293)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.Action.runWithEvent(Action.java:499)

	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem$6.handleEvent(ActionContributionItem.java:441)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:1085)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3166)

this is a duplicate of 
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=160285 
which has been fixed.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 160285 ***
verified that refresh action is working in 1.0RC3
